io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class ShapeType

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.ShapeType

  • public class ShapeType
extends Object
    A simple storage class for storing the shape type of a panel. Also can be used to get the side length of panel shape types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShapeType

        public ShapeType(int shape)
        Creates an instance of a shape type. The shape parameter takes any of the shape types defined in the ShapeType class. For example, ShapeType.TRIANGLE_AURORA represents an Aurora panel.
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape type

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Gets the integer value of this shape type. This is the value used to represent shape types in JSON format.
        Returns:
        the shape type integer value
